JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Bus Drivers - Copenhagen

Red Sightseeing Denmark is looking for bus drivers for 2022. Can you see yourself behind the wheel of our double-decker sightseeing buses and are you an outgoing person who like to interact with people and provide great customer service then we have the prefect summer job for you!

You can expect from us:

  • A fun, international, flexible workplace
  • Minimum 185 DKK/hour + holiday pay
  • Seasonal employment (March to end of September)
  • Optional prolonged employment

You must have:

  • A valid bus driver’s license
  • A valid code 95
  • A valid working permit for DK
  • Good English skills

We expect you to be:

  • Reliable, engaged and respectful
  • Flexible in working types and hours

 

The employment is in accordance with the employment laws and collective agreement. We encourage anyone interested in the position to apply regardless of gender, age, sexuality, religion, or ethnicity.

Test driving and interview will take place in Copenhagen.

Please contact Mads Anchersen if you have any questions

mads.anchersen@tourismgroup.com

 Kørekort:

Bus Erhverv (Buskørekort-erhverv), D (Stor bus), EU-Bus erhverv (EU-chaufføruddannelsesbevis – bus erhverv)
